TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationDeployment extends System.Object

summary.span: 支持以编程方式更新当前部署，以及处理文件的按需下载。

span.span: Supports updates of the current deployment programmatically, and handles on-demand downloading of files.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以配置你[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序检查更新并将其安装自动通过`subscription`部署清单的元素。You can configure your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to check for updates and install them automatically through the `subscription` element of the deployment manifest. 某些应用程序，但是，需要更好地控制其更新。Some applications, however, need finer control over their updates. 你可能想要以编程方式，安装所需的更新，并提示用户安装在方便的可选更新。You may want to install required updates programmatically, and prompt users to install optional updates at their convenience. 通过关闭部署清单中的订阅更新，你可能需要应用程序的更新策略的完全的控制。By turning off subscription updates in the deployment manifest, you can take complete control of your application's update policies. 或者，可以结合使用自动订阅，它使[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]定期更新应用程序，但使用不久之后发布它们时才下载关键更新。Alternatively, you can use automatic subscription in conjunction with , which enables [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] to update the application periodically, but uses to download critical updates shortly after they are released. 你可以测试你的部署是否有可用的更新通过使用或方法; 后一种方法引发上成功完成事件。You can test whether your deployment has an available update by using either the or the method; the latter method raises the event on successful completion. 返回有关此更新，例如其版本号，以及是否有当前用户所需的更新的重要信息。 returns important information about the update, such as its version number and whether it is a required update for current users. 如果有可用的更新，你可以通过安装它或; 后一种方法将引发事件之后的更新安装已完成。If an update is available, you can install it by using or ; the latter method raises the event after installation of the update is complete. 对于大型更新，你可以接收进度通知通过和事件，并使用中的信息通知下载状态的用户。For large updates, you can receive progress notifications through the and events, and use the information in to notify the user of the download status. 你还可以使用下载较大的文件和按需程序集。You can also use to download large files and assemblies on demand. 这些文件必须标记为"可选"内部署的应用程序清单，以便在安装期间不下载。These files must be marked as "optional" within the deployment's application manifest so that they are not downloaded during installation. 可以通过在应用程序的持续时间下载的文件的任何时刻或方法。You can download the files at any point during the application's duration by using the or the method. 通过提供的事件处理程序被加载到内存之前，你可以下载程序集上的事件类。You can download assemblies before they are loaded into memory by supplying an event handler for the event on the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：在设计器中使用 ClickOnce 部署 API 按需下载程序集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5). > [!NOTE] > 如果你更新[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序运行应用程序时，用户将无法查看更新，直到你调用方法，这将关闭应用程序的当前运行的实例并立即重新启动它。If you update a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application while the application is running, the user will not see the updates until you call the method of the , which will close the current running instance of the application and immediately restart it. 没有公共构造函数;获取在类的实例[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]通过应用程序属性。 has no public constructor; you obtain instances of the class within a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application through the property. 你使用属性以验证当前应用程序是否[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序。You use the property to verify that the current application is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application. 支持检查更新和下载更新文件以异步方式使用新的[基于事件的异步模式概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)，从而将公开为类事件完成回调。 supports checking for updates and downloading updated files asynchronously by using the new [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md), which exposes completion callbacks as class events. 开头和为你管理线程，并且在正确的 UI 线程上回调应用程序。 starts and manages the threads for you, and calls your application back on the correct UI thread. 通过此类中，你可以更新而不锁定应用程序，以便用户可以继续工作时安装的更新。Through this class, you can update without locking up the application, so that the user can continue working while the update installs. 如果更新发生时，用户必须停止所有工作，请考虑改为使用同步方法。If the user must stop all work while an update takes place, consider using the synchronous methods instead. > [!NOTE] > 执行异步更新需要，你的应用程序同时导入和命名空间。Performing asynchronous updates requires that your application import both the and namespaces. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定在应用程序加载时，是否有可用; 新的更新如果所需的更新可用时，代码示例将以异步方式安装此更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, the code example installs the update asynchronously. 应将此代码添加到一个包含窗体名为`downloadStatus`。This code should be added to a form that contains a named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法比较当前安装的部署使用位于部署清单中指定的版本的版本。The method compares the version of the currently installed deployment with the version specified in the deployment manifest found at . 如果服务器上的版本是已安装的版本不同，它将返回`true`。If the version on the server is different from the installed version, it returns `true`. 此方法将受阻，直到完成该检查。This method will block until the check has completed. 若要以异步方式检查更新，请使用方法相反。To check for an update asynchronously, use the method instead. > [!NOTE] > 如果发现更新可用，并且用户选择不安装它，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]会提示有可用的更新在下次运行应用程序的用户。If discovers that an update is available, and the user chooses not to install it, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will prompt the user that an update is available the next time the application is run. 没有方法来禁用此提示。There is no way to disable this prompting. (如果应用程序所需的更新，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]无提示安装。)(If the application is a required update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will install it without prompting.) ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查应用程序更新中;如果找到一个对象，它会安装它以同步方式。The following code example checks for an application update; if one is available, it installs it synchronously. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将立即返回，启动单独的线程来下载更新的应用程序。 returns immediately and starts a separate thread for downloading the updated application. 当方法完成或被取消时，将引发事件。When the method completes or is canceled, it raises the event. 你可以使用中来确定是否已取消该操作，或如果更新过程中引发了异常，此事件处理程序。You can use in this event handler to determine whether the operation was canceled, or if an exception was raised during update. 你可以通过调用取消异步更新。You can cancel an asynchronous update by calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果发现更新可用，并且用户选择不安装它，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]会提示有可用的更新在下次运行应用程序的用户。If discovers that an update is available, and the user chooses not to install it, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will prompt the user that an update is available the next time the application is run. 没有方法来禁用此提示。There is no way to disable this prompting. (如果应用程序所需的更新，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]无提示安装。)(If the application is a required update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will install it without prompting.) ## Examples 下面的示例以异步方式，检查更新并安装更新，如果存在。The following example checks for an update asynchronously, and installs the update if one exists. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来取消使用启动更新检查方法。Use this method to cancel an update check initiated with the method. 此方法不会取消正在进行，可能已任何后台更新如订阅的一部分启动的更新。This method will not cancel any background update that may already be in progress, such as an update started as part of a subscription. 有关订阅的详细信息，请参阅[选择 ClickOnce 更新策略](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8b6e7bb-4ea0-47f3-91cd-48580bdceccc)。For more information about subscriptions, see [Choosing a ClickOnce Update Strategy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8b6e7bb-4ea0-47f3-91cd-48580bdceccc).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将告诉你，在其他事项、 版本的更新、 更新是多少，日期和可用的更新是必需还是可选之间。The class will tell you, among other things, the version of the update, how large the update is, and whether the available update is required or optional. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来决定是否要求用户安装可用的应用程序更新。The following code example uses to decide whether to ask the user to install the available application update. 如果更新是强制性的升级，事件处理程序不会提示用户。If the update is a mandatory upgrade, the event handler does not prompt the user. 该示例需要部署的 Windows 窗体应用程序包括控件，并且此控件包含控件名为`downloadStatus`。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法创建实例直接在你的应用程序; 必须检索通过的有效实例属性。You cannot create instances of directly in your application; you must retrieve a valid instance through the property. 静态属性才有效只能从已部署使用的应用程序内[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。The static property is valid only from within an application that was deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. 尝试从非调用此属性[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序将引发异常。Attempts to call this property from non-[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications will throw an exception. 如果你正在开发的应用程序可能或可能尚未部署使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]，使用属性要测试是否在当前程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序。If you are developing an application that may or may not be deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the property to test whether the current program is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索和检查，以确定是否已在过去三天中更新应用程序。The following code example retrieves and checks to determine whether the application has been updated in the past three days. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时调用的主应用程序线程上。The event is called on the main application thread. 它是线程安全调用直接在此回调内的应用程序的 Windows 窗体控件。It is thread safe to call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback. 检查属性提供给此回调。Check the property of the supplied to this callback. 如果此属性为`null`，则下载已成功; 如果还没有`null`，安装未成功，并且你可以找到有关通过安装失败的详细信息属性。If this property is `null`, the download was successful; if it is not `null`, the installation did not succeed, and you can find more information about the installation failure through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例下载一组在后台的帮助文件。The following code example downloads a group of Help files in the background. 该示例需要部署的 Windows 窗体应用程序包括控件，并且此控件包含控件名为`downloadStatus`...The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`.. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以确定是否需要执行第一次你的应用程序运行的任何一次性初始化操作。Use to determine whether you need to perform any one-time initialization operations the first time your application runs. 不要假定设置`true`指示应用程序的此实例是第一个要向用户显示其用户界面。Do not assume that a setting of `true` indicates that this instance of an application is the first one to show its user interface to the user. 由于系统调度进程方式，应用程序的一个实例可能具有其属性设置为`true`，但另一个实例可能要在屏幕上呈现的第一个。Due to the way the system schedules processes, one instance of the application may have its property set to `true`, but another instance may be the first to render on the screen. 只要用户从一个版本升级到下一步，此属性的值被重置。The value of this property is reset whenever the user upgrades from one version to the next. 如果你想要执行操作，唯一非常第一个时间的任何版本运行应用程序，你将需要执行其他测试，例如检查创建第一次的文件是否存在或存储标志使用**应用程序设置**。If you want to perform an operation only the very first time any version of the application is run, you will need to perform an additional test, such as checking for the existence of a file you created the first time, or storing a flag using **Application Settings**. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用决定是否要检查的文件组的更新`HelpFiles`。The following code example uses to decide whether to check for an update to the file group `HelpFiles`. 如果已更新一个或多个文件，则会调用若要获得新版本。If one or more of the files have been updated, it calls to obtain the new versions. remarks.format: ## Remarks A[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序可以配置为订阅更新。A [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application can be configured for subscription updates. 在此方案中，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]轮询自动按部署清单中定义的时间间隔的应用程序的部署位置，并确定是否有可用更新。In this scenario, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] polls an application's deployment location automatically at intervals defined in the deployment manifest, and determines whether there is an update available. 返回上次更新检查而不考虑它是否启动订阅或显式检查使用的时间， ， ， ，或方法。 returns the time of the last update check regardless of whether it was initiated by a subscription or by an explicit check using the , , , , or method. 如果安装应用程序后，执行更新检查返回的安装时间。If no update check has been performed since the application was installed, returns the installation time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查是否[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]已在过去三天中的可用更新检查应用程序。The following code example checks whether a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has been checked for available updates in the past three days. remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序被视为更新发布到指定的位置的应用程序的新版本时，并且在应用程序的部署清单中的版本号当前大于应用程序的版本号用户的计算机上安装。An application is considered updated when you publish a new version of the application to the location specified by , and the version number in the application's deployment manifest is greater than the version number of the application currently installed on the user's computer. 调用将阻止，直至下载到客户端计算机更新并将其安装到[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]缓存; 在此期间，应用程序不会对用户的响应性。The call will block until the update has been downloaded to the client computer and installed into the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] cache; during this time, the application will not be responsive to the user. 如果你想要维护应用程序响应能力或在下载时，使用显示的进度报告方法相反。If you want to maintain application responsiveness or display a progress report during download, use the method instead. 下载所有未标记为"可选"应用程序清单中的文件。 downloads all of the files that are not marked as "optional" in the application manifest. 你可以通过使用下载可选文件按需或方法。You can download optional files on demand by using the or the method. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 可能已将更新应用程序自动在调用时方法; 如果发生这种情况，调用此方法将引发。 may already be updating the application automatically when you call the method; if that happens, calls to this method will throw an . 如果你已在你的部署中更新一个或多个文件，但不是刷新应用程序清单，你将收到。If you have updated one or more files in your deployment, but you have not refreshed your application manifest, you will receive an . 大多数情况下，重新部署你[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序可解决此问题。Most of the time, redeploying your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application solves this problem. 如果上的部署清单或应用程序清单的公共密钥签名无效或缺失，也会收到此异常。You will also receive this exception if a public-key signature on a deployment manifest or application manifest is invalid or missing. 更新可能会请求比以前版本的应用程序更高级别的本地计算机上的信任。An update may request a higher level of trust on the local computer than the previous version of the application. 如果应用程序使用受信任的应用程序部署，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 信任关系管理器将检查部署清单，以确定其是否包含有效的信任许可证。If the application uses Trusted Application Deployment, the common language runtime (CLR) trust manager examines the deployment manifest to determine whether it contains a valid trust license. 如果部署清单不包含有效的信任许可证，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]将停止安装，并引发。If the deployment manifest does not contain a valid trust license, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stops the installation and throws a . 方法将永远不会显示一个提示，询问用户他们是否希望向其授予应用程序的权限运行。The method will never display a prompt asking the user whether they want to grant the application permission to run. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查应用程序更新中;如果有可用的更新，它会安装它以同步方式。The following code example checks for an application update; if an update is available, it installs it synchronously. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 开始异步下载和安装此应用程序的最新版本。

span.span: Starts an asynchronous download and installation of the latest version of this application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序被视为更新发布到指定的位置的应用程序的新版本时，并且在应用程序的部署清单中的版本号当前大于应用程序的版本号用户的计算机上安装。An application is considered updated when you publish a new version of the application to the location specified by , and the version number in the application's deployment manifest is greater than the version number of the application currently installed on the user's computer. 在下载更新，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]将引发上的主应用程序线程，以通知你下载的状态的事件处理程序。While downloading the update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will raise the event handler on the main application thread to inform you of the status of the download. 当异步更新完成或遇到的异常，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]将引发在主应用程序线程上的事件。When the asynchronous update finishes or encounters an exception, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will raise the event on the main application thread. 检查提供给此事件可以确定更新是否成功。Examine the supplied to this event to determine whether the update succeeded. 如果引发异常，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]调用和设置属性到已引发的异常。If throws an exception, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] calls and sets the property of to the exception that was thrown. 将下载在部署中未标记为"可选"应用程序清单中的所有文件。 will download all files in a deployment not marked as "optional" in the application manifest. 你可以通过使用下载可选文件按需或方法。You can download optional files on demand by using the or the method. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 可能已将更新应用程序自动在调用时方法; 如果发生这种情况，调用此方法将引发。 may already be updating the application automatically when you call the method; if that happens, calls to this method will throw an . 如果你已在你的部署中更新一个或多个文件，但不是刷新应用程序清单，你将收到。If you have updated one or more files in your deployment, but you have not refreshed your application manifest, you will receive an . 大多数情况下，重新生成你的应用程序清单可解决此问题。Most of the time, rebuilding your application manifest solves this problem. 如果上的部署清单或应用程序清单的公共密钥签名无效或缺失，也会收到此异常。You will also receive this exception if a public-key signature on a deployment manifest or application manifest is invalid or missing. 更新可能会请求比以前版本的应用程序更高级别的本地计算机上的信任。An update may request a higher level of trust on the local computer than the previous version of the application. 如果应用程序使用受信任的应用程序部署，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 信任关系管理器将检查部署清单，以确定其是否包含有效的信任许可证。If the application uses Trusted Application Deployment, the common language runtime (CLR) trust manager examines the deployment manifest to determine whether it contains a valid trust license. 如果部署清单不包含有效的信任许可证，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]将停止安装，并引发。If the deployment manifest does not contain a valid trust license, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stops the installation and throws a . 将永远不会显示一个提示，询问用户他们想要授予应用程序的权限运行。 will never display a prompt asking the user if they want to grant the application permission to run. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定在应用程序加载时; 是否可用的新更新如果所需的更新可用，它以异步方式安装更新。The following code example determines whether a new update is available at application load time; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously. 该示例需要部署的 Windows 窗体应用程序包括控件，并且此控件包含控件名为`downloadStatus`。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时调用的主应用程序线程上。The event is called on the main application thread. 你可能不会引发异常的情况下调用直接在此回调内的应用程序的 Windows 窗体控件。You may call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback without triggering an exception. 检查属性提供给此回调。Check the property of the supplied to this callback. 如果此属性为`null`，安装是否成功; 如果还没有`null`，安装未成功，并且你可以找到有关通过此安装故障的详细信息属性。If this property is `null`, the installation was successful; if it is not `null`, the installation did not succeed, and you can find more information about this installation failure through the property. 一旦已经下载的更新，你将需要调用方法使用应用程序的较新版本。Once the update has been downloaded, you will need to call the method on the to use the newer version of the application. 如果更新安装已取消通过调用、属性类将`true`。If the installation of the update was canceled by a call to , the property of the class will be `true`. 若要使用此事件处理程序，你的应用程序必须同时导入和命名空间。To use this event handler, your application must import both the and namespaces. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定在应用程序加载时，是否有可用; 新的更新如果所需的更新可用，它以异步方式安装更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously. 该示例需要部署的 Windows 窗体应用程序包括控件，并且此控件包含控件名为`downloadStatus`。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. span.span: Occurs when [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] has new status information for an update operation initiated by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时调用的主应用程序线程上。The event is called on the main application thread. 你可能不会引发异常的情况下调用直接在此回调内的应用程序的 Windows 窗体控件。You may call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback without triggering an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定在应用程序加载时，是否有可用; 新的更新如果所需的更新可用，它以异步方式安装更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]
